news.title: SoFi Bank Debuts First U.S. National Bank-Issued Stablecoin
news.body: SoFi Bank has launched a groundbreaking stablecoin on a public, permissionless blockchain, becoming the first U.S. national bank to do so. This move not only bridges traditional banking with blockchain technology but also sets a potential trend for other financial institutions to follow, reshaping how they operate in the digital currency space.

news.title: Google Introduces UPI-Linked Credit Card in India
news.body: Google has rolled out a UPI-powered digital co-branded credit card in India, targeting one of the largest consumer markets globally. This innovative product merges the ubiquitous UPI interface with credit facilities, aiming to boost convenience and financial inclusion. This strategic expansion could significantly influence digital payment landscapes in emerging markets.

news.title: TikTok Secures U.S. Operations with Oracle-Led Joint Venture
news.body: TikTok, in partnership with Oracle, Silver Lake, and MGX, has formed a joint venture to secure its operations in the U.S., effective January 22. This strategic alliance is pivotal in maintaining TikTok's presence in the lucrative U.S. market, potentially influencing social media and tech industry dynamics significantly.

news.title: Stablecoin Platform RedotPay Secures $107 Million in Series B
news.body: RedotPay, a notable player in the stablecoin market, has raised $107 million in a Series B funding round, bringing its total 2025 capital to $194 million. This substantial investment highlights growing confidence in stablecoin technologies, suggesting a transformative impact on future financial transactions.

news.title: EU Sets New Regulations to Foster Retail Investment in Capital Markets
news.body: The European Union has enacted new rules to encourage retail investment in its capital markets, aiming to deepen market integration and enhance investment opportunities. This regulatory shift is crucial for fostering economic growth and could significantly impact the financial landscape in Europe.
